job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p><strong>Job Summary</strong></p><p>Our Client is seeking a data scientist to join a newly created team. This individual will be&nbsp;modeling complex business problems, discover key insights, and identify opportunities; in order to accomplish this, an academic and practical knowledge of applying statistical, algorithmic, mathematical, and technological techniques is paramount.&nbsp;The ideal candidate will have 3-5 years of experience, preferably in an omni channel&nbsp;environment.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Primary Responsibilities</strong></p><ul><li>Collaborate internally and cross-divisionally to formulate analytical applications that help solve business problems</li><li>Experience building and delivering complex systems that leverage various machine learning algorithms</li><li>Work with large and complex financial data sets.</li><li>Active involvement in R&amp;D efforts to enable analysis, data modeling, product development, and meaningful insights relevant to the enterprise’s domains</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Qualifications</strong></p><ul><li>M.S. or higher in a quantitative field such as Computer Science, Statistics or Mathematics</li><li>3+ years of Data Science experience, with expertise in machine learning and statistical modeling</li><li>Strong written &amp; verbal communication and presentation skills, with experience crafting a compelling narrative supported by data</li></ul>
